name: End Of The Line (anothernoodle)
description: An otherworldly being named Eddie has arrived on earth to challenge humanity to a card game. They have put the world in a state of severe climate change, rendering the tropical city state of Singapore completely snowed over. You play as Penny, a young woman who has risen through the ranks of tournaments to earn her chance at beating Eddie, who promises to fix the climate if a human can beat them.
